|brand = Silver Peak |model = Unity EdgeConnect |submodelappend = yes |submodel = EC-XS |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/24/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Silver_Peak_Unity_EdgeConnect_EC-XS |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = SD-WAN Router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;C2358; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz <!-- CPU1 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = CF card |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Wintec;; |flash1size = 2 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = CMOS Serial |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q64JVSIQ; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SO-DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 GiB |ram1chip = Wintec;WD3SE808G16NSE-SPK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1543; |eth3chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |eth4chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1B:BC
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Grub;0.97;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.38.6-rc1;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, buzzer, power switch, metal case, heatsink, fan |addchip = LPC I/O Controller;Winbond;W83627DHG;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;1;,,, 256K SPI Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT25256B;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02D;;1;,,, ATA to Serial ATA Bi-direction Bridge;Sunplus Tech;SPIF223A;;1;,,, 3+1 Voltage Regulator for IMVP-7/VR12 CPUs;Intersil;ISL95831;;1;,,, 3V 16Mbit Serial Flash Memory w/ SPI;Winbond;W25Q16DVSFIG;;2;,,, Clock Generator for Intel microServers;Renesas;9VRS4420D;;1;,,, Four Output Differential Buffer for PCIe;Renesas;ICS9DB403D;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;ANPEC;APL1117;;1;,,, Asymmetric Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS3669S;;3 ;,,, Single-Phase D-CAP Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS51518;;1;,,, Dual Synchronous Step-Down Controller;TI;TPS51225;;1;,,, Synchronous Buck NexFET Power Block;TI;CSD87350Q5D;;1;,,, Single-Synchronous Step-Down Controller;TI;TPS51219;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS7620S;;2;,,, 30V, 14.5A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6673BZ;;2;,,, 30V, 14A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS7694;;2;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;1;,,, 3A LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9018A;;4;, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 169.254.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = Lanner |manuf_model = FW-7551A |manuf_rev = -SV1 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/2015 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C2358 @1.7GHz (Dual-Core) *Memory: 8GB DDR3 ECC (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 2GB WinTec CompactFlash :8MB CMOS Serial Flash, 120GB SATA 3.0 SSD *Network: 6x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 3A via barrel
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.silver-peak.com/sites/default/files/infoctr/spec_sheet_edgeconnect_xs.pdf Spec. Sheet]
